title: King of diamonds
brief_description: Traces the history of diamond mining in South Africa, showing scenes inside diamond mines. Provides an insight into the work required to convert the raw stones into sparkling precious gems.
description: Traces the history of diamond mining in South Africa, showing scenes inside diamond mines. Provides an insight into the work required to convert the raw stones into sparkling precious gems.
